title: Vase with stand
description: vase with stand, Peachblow lead glass in deep rose red (at top) shading to yellow at base; plated or cased glass with glossy finish and white lining; griffin shaped base in amber pressed glass (imitation of wood original) Known as the \'Morgan Vase\'; probably after 1886
creditline: Gift of Clinton C. Heim in memory of my dear friend Jon Schewe
